title: email msgs include incorrect graphics (i.e. images from other msgs)
content: The subject line says it all. The only thing I can add is that some messages are displaying graphics from messages adjacent to them in the inbox display. I tried compacting but that made no difference. DS
creator: maytheschwartz

title: Roll back from 115.4.3 just a little (earlier 115)?
content:
As everyone here knows, Thunderbird 115 is a hot mess; sadly, as they cycle through new releases, it sometimes gets worse, not better. It appears from my update history that 115.2.3 was the most stable of the 115 versions. I'd rather go back to 102 but it seems that the profile was modified in 115 so that it is no longer compatible with 102. Thus a 102 rollback might require quite a bit of work to reimport the profile into a clean install. And I have gigabytes of important mail.

I'm not on 115.4.3 and it is close to unusable, as they screwed up regression in a major bug, and my bugzilla on it has sat unanswered, other than requesting I be nice to the devs. So as a lower-risk option might be to roll back from 115.4.3 to 115.2.3. Has anyone tried anything like that, or know the safest way? I don't know what booby traps they've planted to prevent any rollbacks. Thanks!
creator: fred37

title: Email Text Colours
content: When I compose an email, I can change my text colour. However, as a test I send to myself, and the text arrives in the in box in black font only. I have received emails from others,where they have indicated for example, see green notes. However there is no green text? So it looks like when I receive any emails, that have any colour included in the text, I only see all text in black?

title: Thunderbird 115.x.x "J" shortcut to designate Junk no longer works

title: updates
content: updates of all kinds, for whatever the program have caused me more problems and down time than any virus ever has. i put off restarting thunderbird and edge for weeks or maybe months for fear of a failure. i dropped my guard for just a moment and accidentally allowed a restart and sure enough it now appears that thunderbird is fatally flawed. before the update it worked perfectly. God only knows what it will take to get it working again. i'm tired of fooling with fixes that don't work so if mozilla doesn't fix it i will have to move on to something that does work. if it ain't broke, please don't fix it.
creator: wglass.90

title: vlakna
content:
Dobrý den, nechci používat vlákna, jak se lze toho zcela zbavit? Kvuli tomu jsem odešla od jiných aplikací. Vlákna skrývají nejnovější zprávy, mám stovky mejlů a nemůžu procházet kazdé vlákno a sledovat kde je nejnovejsí mejl. chci mít nejposlednejsi mejly srovnane dle času a ne vláken. TJ. nejnovejsi konverzaci mit dle datumu zcela nahore ne nekde uprostred vlaken kterych muze byt v konverzaci mnoho...

Vypinat to pokazdém otevreni prohlížece je peklo a trvale mi to jede vypnout. Muzete mi nejak poradit? Predem dekuji Petra
creator: usibiku

title: Open message in separate window
content:
Have TB 115.3.3 on Win11. I have my messages set to open as tabs. Previously, if I needed a message to open in a separate window, I would click "More" in the upper right of the message window itself, and it would open in a new window that I could then position next to another app to reference the content.

Since v115, that option in More has disappeared, and I can't figure out where it went. Is it still possible to do? Can someone please help me? 

Thank you!

--Victoria
creator: Victoria-nola

title: unable to set up multiple yahoo email addresses properly in thunderbird--all download emails from the same account
content: I am trying to set up 3 yahoo email addresses in Thunderbird for myself and my family. I was able to set up the first one (mine) successfully using Thunderbird's email setup wizard which uses Oauth, but when I try to set up their email addresses, for some reason it redirects the Oauth login to my email address, so even though my family's email addresses are set up, they end up downloading my emails, so all email addresses download the same emails. I have never experienced this problem before and hope someone can help.
creator: vetboy

title: Gmail IMAP Folder Changed in Supernova
content: Hello. Latest update Supernova (now using 115.5.0 but this happened a few weeks ago) has eliminated the yellow Gmail IMAP folder and now those folders are listed in Folder pane on the same level with TB folders and icons. The result is confusing as to which are TB and which are Gmail. Two Drafts folders, a Bin and a Trash folder, a Junk and a Spam folder as well as a Sent and Sent Mail folder. In previous versions, Gmail was a yellow folder that, when expanded, listed all Gmail IMAP subfolders. Now it's hard to tell what's what. Any suggestions as to revive the previous - and much clearer - layout where Gmail was its own yellow folder and IMAP Inbox, Sent Mail, etc. were underneath as subfolders? Thanks in advance to the good guys in here who generously give their time and efforts helping out confused customers such as myself! Your efforts ARE appreciated... Cheers, Ted
creator: teddybearable

title: Every log in downloading thousands of emails?
content: Hello, Thunderbird user daily for years. Lately every time I open Thunderbird it starts downloading a random number of emails, usually in the thousands. this makes the app extremely slow and laggy until it finishes. I use it daily, on avg getting 20-30 emails. I don't understand why its downloading emails form months to years ago.
creator: robbiecampbell65

title: Outgoing (pre-send) mail filters - how?
content:
Hello,

how do I set up an outgoing mail filter in Thunderbird that is applied before the email is actually sent?

I'm using this to automatically add (varying) Cc/Bcc recipients to the email before sending, depending on the mail account used for sending and the recipient's mail address/domain, change the To address based on some condition, or switch to a different From address based e.g. on contents.

As I understand it, TB allows me to apply filters automatically on a mail only after it has already been sent, which for my use cases is too late.

Any ideas? Is there a plugin that does this?

Thanks, Christian
creator: kriro18

title: supernova
content:
supernovA how do I go back to "classic" which works? the new version has problems all over it , I can't move an email to folders as the folders have disappeared in the navigation bar and the pull down only shows about 8 folders ,, , the navigation bars is totally new and not a good UI at all, too much change with a big bang, no support , no way to fix it..it was easy to use - but now no longer , as I can't do anything ,, let alone even play with it and learn.

You should never release software to a user base without stepping them through things first, , you've probably turned a lot of people off.. and could have lost them forever

its frustrating,

title: Support recurring tasks from Google Calendar
content: Thunderbird allows me to connect my Google Calendar to TB. But it doesn't allow me to add the new Google Tasks calendar. For that, I need to use Google Calendar Provider. Once subscribed to Google Tasks I can create and manage tasks. However, I cannot create, manage, or even see tasks that recur. TB should either support Google Tasks natively or through Google Calendar Provider support recurring tasks.
creator: Andrew5
